description: Index videos using TwelveLabs and add the video_id to metadata.

videodata.info: Video Data objects (from VideoFile or SplitVideo)

model_name.info: Pegasus model to use for indexing

index_name.info: Name of the index to use. If the index doesn't exist, it will be created.

index_id.info: ID of an existing index to use. If provided, index_name will be ignored.
